statements: UPDATE user_data SET phone_number='123-456-7890', email='newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE user_data SET first_name='Alice', last_name='Johnson', address='123 Main St' WHERE email='oldemail@example.com';
UPDATE user_data SET first_name='John', last_name='Doe', phone_number='1234567890' WHERE user_id=1
UPDATE user_data SET email='johndoe@example.com', address='123 Main St', last_name='Smith' WHERE user_id=2
UPDATE users SET name = 'John Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE users SET phone = '123-456-7890', email = 'jane.smith@example.com' WHERE name = 'Jane Smith';
UPDATE users SET email='new.email@example.com', phone='+123456789' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE users SET phone='+987654321' WHERE name='John Doe';
UPDATE users SET full_name='John Doe', email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE products SET price=39.99, category='Electronics' WHERE product_id=3;
UPDATE users SET full_name = 'John Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE orders SET total_amount = 1000, order_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE order_id = 5;
UPDATE users SET first_name='John', last_name='Doe', email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE addresses SET city='New York', state='NY', zipcode='10001', street_address='123 Main St' WHERE user_id=2;
UPDATE users SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe', phone_number = '(123) 456-7890' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE credit_cards SET card_number = '1234 5678 9012 3456', cvv = '123' WHERE user_id = 1;

UPDATE payments SET card_number='1234-5678-9012-3456', cvv='123' WHERE id=2;

UPDATE addresses SET city = 'New York', state = 'NY' WHERE id = 2;
